product_name: Not Your Mother'sCurl Talk Flash Freeze Gel
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsNot Your Mother's Curl Talk Flash Freeze Gel is a maximum-hold styling gel that hydrates and defines. Style those curls, tame that frizz, and lay those edges - your curls are going to thank you for it.
details: DetailsBenefitsMaximum-strength hair gelFlake freeAdds lasting definition to curlsHydratesTames frizzFormulated with Rice Curl ComplexContains proteinGreat for curly to coily hair typesCitrus & jasmine scentSafe for natural & color-treated hairFree of sulfate surfactants, silicones, parabens, phthalates & drying alcoholPackaging may varyItem 2582782How To UseScrunch into wet hair and let dry. Apply in small quantities and increase amounts as needed.IngredientsWater, Polyquaternium-69, PVP, Acrylates/Steareth-20 Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Glycerin, Keratin Amino Acids, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Lactobacillus/Tomato Fruit Ferment Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Acyl Coenzyme A Desaturase, Fragrance (Parfum), Tetrasodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Hydroxide.
how_to_use: Scrunch into wet hair and let dry. Apply in small quantities and increase amounts as needed.

reviews.headline: New formula is not it!
reviews.comments:
I used the Hard Hold gel on my wavy/curly hair for 3+ years. I loved it for the great cast and I only needed to use a little for great results. Last time I ordered, I received one bottle of the Hard Hold and one bottle of the Flash Freeze because they were reformulating it and the sku had not changed. 

This week I had multiple bad wash days in a row, with really stringy and frizzy hair. The only thing that changed in my routine was that my Hard Hold bottle ran out and I started on the Flash Freeze bottle.

I'm disappointed that I need to find something new. I recommended the previous formulation to all my curly friends!

reviews.headline: Holy grail
reviews.comments: My new holy grail product! My hair has been so dry and frizzy in the humidity. With this, my curls/waves last for at least a day, and my hair stays so healthy and hydrated until my next wash.

reviews.headline: The Bomb!
reviews.comments: Love this product! Only thing that controls my hair.

reviews.headline: Scrunch out the crunch!
reviews.comments: Okay people, I don't take the time to review many things. So you know it's either really bad or really good if I'm writing a review. This gel is the icing on the cake. Is this case, its my hair. My hair is a frizzy mess, and this is the first hard-hold gel I've tried that actually keeps my hair frizz free after scrunching out the crunch. It doesnt take very much product to get a good cast. Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Perfect for fine hair
reviews.comments: My fine wavy hair holds its shape much better with this as a finishing product. I don't use a lot and layer after wave/curl cream and at least one other gel depending on weather. Diffuses beautifully.

reviews.headline: My holy grail
reviews.comments: This gel makes my 2C-3A  fine curls POP like nothing else ðŸ¥² I've been using it for years, rec'd by YouTuber Gina Marie for its protein and hold. It makes my curls shiny and defined for daaaaays. Love it!

reviews.headline: On vacation
reviews.comments: Im on vacation so i was trying  a substitute . This tangles my hair , No slip and definitely dries out the curls .

reviews.headline: Great hold and shine but a little to heavy for thin hair
reviews.comments: I liked this a lot. This it is definitely my favorite gel but my only complaint is it weighed down my curls and made them a but flat but definitely will be my go to in the heat!

reviews.headline: Great hold and shine but a little to heavy for thin hair
reviews.comments: I liked this a lot. This it is definitely my favorite gel but my only complaint is it weighed down my curls and made them a but flat but definitely will be my go to in the heat!

reviews.headline: BEWARE
reviews.comments: The online listing doesn't include sodium laurel sulfate which is listed on the bottle as an ingredient but it is NOT listed in the online ingredients.

reviews.headline: Ingredient list incorrect
reviews.comments: There is sodium laurel sulfate listed on the bottle as an ingredient but it is NOT listed in the online ingredients. I have eczema on my scalp and this irritated my skin so much!!!

reviews.headline: Incorrect ingredients listed online
reviews.comments: Why does the ingredients listed online not the same as the ingredients listed on the bottle? There is sodium laurel sulfate in this that isnt listed on Ulta's ingredient list for this product.

reviews.headline: Great gel
reviews.comments: I loved the regular gel, I didn't know this one existedâ€¦ now, I'll be buying this one everytime. Great price for it too!

reviews.headline: Finally found a gel that keeps my curls in place
reviews.comments: I've always struggled to find a hair gel that actually keeps my waves styled. I love this hair gel, and will continue to buy again and again.

reviews.headline: So sad they changed the formula
reviews.comments: I am so bummed they changed this formula from the original "hard hold" gel! It isn't nearly as good now. Whyyyyy???.

reviews.headline: The only thing that works!
reviews.comments: This gel has changed my curl game dramatically! I get so many questions about my hair care and routine when I use it. Apply to wet, well-conditioned curls and let air dry after drying just the roots. Scrunch the crunch once dry and you're done!

reviews.headline: My new favorite gel
reviews.comments: I have used SO many gels over the years from all different price points. I cannot believe how much I like this one. I have fine wavy hair and this does a phenomenal job with hold, creates an unbelievable cast, and is really easy to work with. Best of all, even though it's inexpensive, a little goes a very long way. my hair doesn't feel dried out or tangly the next time I wash, and I will absolutely buy it again. I use it with the Curl Talk curl cream, JVN Embody foam, and Bondi Boost heat protectant.

reviews.headline: One of the best gels I've used!
reviews.comments: I love this gel! It lives up to its name and it lasts for several days in my hair. I recommend using a curl cream or leave in conditioner underneath the gel cause it will help you spread the product throughout your hair. I have medium to coarse textured hair, low density, low porosity.

reviews.headline: Always will re-purchase.!
reviews.comments: This is my favorite gel period!!!! I have purchased multiple times for years. I have medium textured hair.. And it does not weigh my hair down. It gives a super hard crunchy cast, which I love. When it is 100% dry, I will scrunch it out and then add the Aussie sprunch spray on top. I also use the not your mother's curl cream before I add the gel and this combination is perfect. I love that it has a super stronghold and has protein.

reviews.headline: Best gel ever
reviews.comments: This gel is my absolute favorite! It creates a strong gel cast which allows my hair to be locked into place. Once the cast is set and my hair is dry, I scrunch it out with an oil and I am left with the most perfect curls.

media.headline: Amazing Curls
media.caption: Loving my hair after using Curl Talk

media.headline: Holds Curls and Controls my frizz
media.caption: Holds your curls!

faceoff_positive.comments: I have lived with curly hair all of my life!!! If a product is made for curly I'm trying it because I am always on the hunt for the BEST!!! I have been committed to a certain brand for a long time and their mousse for curly hair. I was excited to try this and a little nervous because I prefer the mousse texture over a gel texture. I LOVED this product!!! I have been using it in conjunction with their hair oil as well for extra moisture. The one standout quality of this product is that it dries quickly and holds the curls as they dry. My mousse takes forever to dry and sometimes by then I've gotten hot and my hair gets frizzy and it dries funny. This product makes my hair perfectly curled with just a scrunch with your hands. The one thing to be aware of is, it is super hard hold so you only need a SMALL amount like dime size or smaller, and be sure to really spread it out, and do not get it heavily concentrated in any one area because it will be crunchy and stay looking wet! Overall, LOVE this product and will be sharing this info with my curly haired friends!!!
faceoff_positive.headline: Incredible hold and fast drying!

faceoff_negative.comments: I  used this along with the plump for joy root lifter, for the first time along with a  miel hair mousse. I  have been using the mousse for a  couple of years with outstanding results for my wash and gos. I  decided to add the two not your moms' products to change it up. Usually, my hair curls up into beautiful ringlets but this time my hair turned into a  dry tight afro.   My hair went from 2C to beyond 4C. My hair was so dry and tangled that I  had to completely rewash my hair to detangle and get it remoisturize . I  could not even get a  comb through it. I  have never had this bad of an experience with any other brand  so I  will never use this brand ever again. I  had high hopes for this product line because it is cheaper than a  lot of the other brands, but  I  guess you get what you pay for. I  am so very grateful that I  saved my receipt.
faceoff_negative.headline: more like hard to comb hair style
